Name: Fairy Sugar Mama
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon twist (discarded) & mint leaf pegged to rim.
Review: Fruit juice, almond syrup and bold bittersweet flavours mask a whole shot of absinthe in this baby pink drink.
History: Created in 2014 by Andy Mil at the London Cocktail Club in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Fairy Sugar Mama contains 233 calories
